title: Quinebaug & Shetucket Rivers Valley National Heritage Corridor: Weather
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Know Before You Come     Weather              Weather       Weather and Climate  New England weather is notable for rapid change. Temperature during the summer is 70-80s F., winter 20-40s F. and spring/fall 50-70s F. Wear appropriate clothing and shoes for outdoor activities based on the season.
